SEARCH
Package com.sangarius.oop.library.persistence.repository

Interface Repository<E extends Entity>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of entity managed by the repository
All Known Subinterfaces:
BookRepository, CategoryRepository, LibraryRepository, LoanRepository, ReviewRepository, UserRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
BookJsonRepositoryImpl, CategoryJsonRepositoryImpl, GenericJsonRepository, LibraryJsonRepositoryImpl, LoanJsonRepositoryImpl, ReviewJsonRepositoryImpl, UserJsonRepositoryImpl
public interface Repository<E extends Entity>
The base interface for repositories that manage entities of type E.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    E
    add(E entity)
    Adds a new entity to the repository.
    Set<E>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all entities managed by the repository.
    Set<E>
    findAll(Predicate<E> filter)
    Retrieves all entities managed by the repository that match the given filter predicate.
    Optional<E>
    findById(UUID id)
    Retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.
    boolean
    remove(E entity)
    Removes the specified entity from the repository.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<E> findById(UUID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the entity if found, or empty if not found

    • findAll

      Set<E> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities managed by the repository.
      Returns:
      a set containing all entities managed by the repository

    • findAll

      Set<E> findAll(Predicate<E> filter)
      Retrieves all entities managed by the repository that match the given filter predicate.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used to filter entities
      Returns:
      a set containing all entities that match the filter predicate

    • add

      E add(E entity)
      Adds a new entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to add
      Returns:
      the added entity

    • remove

      boolean remove(E entity)
      Removes the specified entity from the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to remove
      Returns:
      true if the entity was successfully removed, false otherwise
